trans-unit.source: Represents the exceptions that are thrown when an error is raised by the Peer-to-Peer Infrastructure.
Exceptions of this type are specific to the PNRP platform, and indicate that the underlying platform could not perform a certain operation.
Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> class with the supplied message string.
The error message that provides the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> class with serialized data.
Reference to the object that holds the data needed to deserialize the object.
Context that provides the means for deserializing the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> data.
Also referred to as the source of the serialized data.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> class with the supplied message string and exception.
The error message that explains the reason for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref>.
The exception instance that caused the current <xref href="System.Exception"></xref>.
Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> interface and returns the data needed to serialize the peer object.
This method is an O(n) operation.
Contains the information required to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> object.
Contains the destination for the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> object.

Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> interface and returns the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> instance.
Contains the information required to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> instance.
Contains the destination for the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException"></xref> instance.
